name: dillinger
description: Game library management platform with cross-platform execution

scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run type-check
scripts.docker:build:runners: pnpm run docker:build:base && pnpm run docker:build:runner:linux-native && pnpm run docker:build:runner:wine
scripts.docker:build:runners:no-cache: pnpm run docker:build:base:no-cache && pnpm run docker:build:runner:linux-native:no-cache && pnpm run docker:build:runner:wine:no-cache
scripts.docker:build:base:no-cache: cd packages/runner-images/base && docker build --no-cache --tag dillinger/runner-base:latest --file Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:build:runner:linux-native:no-cach: cd packages/runner-images/linux-native && docker build --no-cache --tag dillinger/runner-linux-native:latest --file Dockerfile .

author: Dillinger Team
